title: Hero Electric joins hands with ReadyAssist to train 20,000 mechanics
description: The company has undertaken the initiative under its Private Garage Owners (PGO) programme. The partnership will aid in identifying mechanics willing to upgrade their skill set and coaching them in the next two years. The training programme will have two stages divided among beginners and experts.
